primordialjadewingedspear.json.effect: On hit, increases ATK by {0} for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by {1}.

prototypeamber.json.name: Prototype Amber
prototypeamber.json.description: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.
prototypeamber.json.effect: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates {0} Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate {1} HP every 2s for this duration.

prototypearchaic.json.name: Prototype Archaic
prototypearchaic.json.description: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.
prototypearchaic.json.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional {0} ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

prototypecrescent.json.name: Prototype Crescent
prototypecrescent.json.description: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.
prototypecrescent.json.effect: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by {0} for 10s.

prototyperancour.json.name: Prototype Rancour
prototyperancour.json.description: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.
prototyperancour.json.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by {0} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

prototypestarglitter.json.name: Prototype Starglitter
prototypestarglitter.json.description: A grudge discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.
prototypestarglitter.json.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by {0} for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

quartz.json.name: Quartz
quartz.json.description: A simple but heavy greatsword made of polished black quartz with a golden gilt. It has an air of elegance and dignity about it.
quartz.json.effect: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by {0} for 12s.

rainslasher.json.name: Rainslasher
rainslasher.json.description: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.
rainslasher.json.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by {0}.

ravenbow.json.name: Raven Bow
ravenbow.json.description: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.
ravenbow.json.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by {0}.

recurvebow.json.name: Recurve Bow
recurvebow.json.description: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.

royalbow.json.name: Royal Bow
royalbow.json.description: An old royal longbow that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and can still fire arrows with great force.
royalbow.json.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {0}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royalgreatsword.json.name: Royal Greatsword
royalgreatsword.json.description: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by royals only.
royalgreatsword.json.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {0}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royalgrimoire.json.name: Royal Grimoire
royalgrimoire.json.description: A book that once belonged to a royal mage of Mondstadt. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as well as magic spells.
royalgrimoire.json.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {0}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royallongsword.json.name: Royal Longsword
royallongsword.json.description: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.
royallongsword.json.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {0}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royalspear.json.name: Royal Spear
royalspear.json.description: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.
royalspear.json.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {0}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

rust.json.name: Rust
rust.json.description: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.
rust.json.effect: Increases Normal Attack DMG by {0} but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

sacrificialbow.json.name: Sacrificial Bow
sacrificialbow.json.description: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
sacrificialbow.json.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {0} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {1}.

sacrificialfragments.json.name: Sacrificial Fragments
sacrificialfragments.json.description: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.
sacrificialfragments.json.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {0} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {1}.

sacrificialgreatsword.json.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
sacrificialgreatsword.json.description: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
sacrificialgreatsword.json.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {0} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {1}.

sacrificialsword.json.name: Sacrificial Sword
sacrificialsword.json.description: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
sacrificialsword.json.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {0} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {1}.

seasonedhuntersbow.json.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow
seasonedhuntersbow.json.description: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

serpentspine.json.name: Serpent Spine
serpentspine.json.description: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.
serpentspine.json.effect: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal {0} more DMG and take {1} more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

sharpshootersoath.json.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
sharpshootersoath.json.description: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.
sharpshootersoath.json.effect: Increases DMG against weak spots by {0}.

silversword.json.name: Silver Sword
silversword.json.description: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

skyridergreatsword.json.name: Skyrider Greatsword
skyridergreatsword.json.description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.
skyridergreatsword.json.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by {0} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

skyridersword.json.name: Skyrider Sword
skyridersword.json.description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...
skyridersword.json.effect: Using an Elemental Burst grants a {0} increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

skywardatlas.json.name: Skyward Atlas
skywardatlas.json.description: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.
skywardatlas.json.effect: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by {0}. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds, which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing {1} ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

skywardblade.json.name: Skyward Blade
skywardblade.json.description: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.
skywardblade.json.effect: CRIT Rate increased by {0}. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by {1}, increases ATK SPD by {2}, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to {3} of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

skywardharp.json.name: Skyward Harp
skywardharp.json.description: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.
skywardharp.json.effect: Increases CRIT DMG by {0}. Hits have a {1} chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every {2}s.

skywardpride.json.name: Skyward Pride
skywardpride.json.description: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.
skywardpride.json.effect: Increases all DMG by {0}. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does {1} of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

skywardspine.json.name: Skyward Spine
skywardspine.json.description: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.
skywardspine.json.effect: Increases CRIT Rate by {0} and increases Normal ATK SPD by {1}. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a {2} chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals {3} of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

slingshot.json.name: Slingshot
slingshot.json.description: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.
slingshot.json.effect: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by {0}. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

snowtombedstarsilver.json.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
snowtombedstarsilver.json.description: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.
snowtombedstarsilver.json.effect: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {0} chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to {1} of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to {2} of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

solarpearl.json.name: Solar Pearl
solarpearl.json.description: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon and pulses with a warm strength.
solarpearl.json.effect: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {0} for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by {1} for 6s.

songofbrokenpines.json.name: Song of Broken Pines
songofbrokenpines.json.description: A greatsword as light as the sigh of grass in the breeze, yet as merciless to the corrupt as a typhoon.
songofbrokenpines.json.effect: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases ATK by {0}, and when Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, the character gains a Sigil of Whispers. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When you possess 4 Sigils of Whispers, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" increases Normal ATK SPD by {1} and increases ATK by {2}. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Whispers for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

staffofhoma.json.name: Staff of Homa
staffofhoma.json.description: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.
staffofhoma.json.effect: HP increased by {0}. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on {1} of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional {2} of Max HP.

summitshaper.json.name: Summit Shaper
summitshaper.json.description: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.
summitshaper.json.effect: Increases Shield Strength by {0}. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {1} for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

swordofdescension.json.name: Sword of Descension
swordofdescension.json.description: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.
swordofdescension.json.effect: Hitting opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks grants a {0} chance to deal {1} ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by {2}.

thealleyflash.json.name: The Alley Flash
thealleyflash.json.description: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.
thealleyflash.json.effect: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by {0}. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

thebell.json.name: The Bell
thebell.json.description: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.
thebell.json.effect: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to {0} of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every {1}s. While protected by the shield, the character gains {2} increased DMG.

theblacksword.json.name: The Black Sword
theblacksword.json.description: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.
theblacksword.json.effect: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by {0}. Additionally, regenerates {1} of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

theflute.json.name: The Flute
theflute.json.description: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.
theflute.json.effect: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals {0} ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

thestringless.json.name: The Stringless
thestringless.json.description: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.
thestringless.json.effect: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {0}.

theunforged.json.name: The Unforged
theunforged.json.description: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.
theunforged.json.effect: Increases Shield Strength by {0}. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {1} for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

theviridescenthunt.json.name: The Viridescent Hunt
theviridescenthunt.json.description: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.
theviridescenthunt.json.effect: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing {0} of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every {1}s.

thewidsith.json.name: The Widsith
thewidsith.json.description: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.
thewidsith.json.effect: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by {0}. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by {1}. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by {2}.

thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.json.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.json.description: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.
thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.json.effect: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by {0} for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

travelershandysword.json.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
travelershandysword.json.description: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.
travelershandysword.json.effect: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores {0} HP.

twinnephrite.json.name: Twin Nephrite
twinnephrite.json.description: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.
twinnephrite.json.effect: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by {0} for 15s.

vortexvanquisher.json.name: Vortex Vanquisher
vortexvanquisher.json.description: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.
vortexvanquisher.json.effect: Increases Shield Strength by {0}. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {1} for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

wastergreatsword.json.name: Waster Greatsword
wastergreatsword.json.description: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains if wielded with enough willpower.

whiteblind.json.name: Whiteblind
whiteblind.json.description: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.
whiteblind.json.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by {0} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

whiteirongreatsword.json.name: White Iron Greatsword
whiteirongreatsword.json.description: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.

whitetassel.json.name: White Tassel
whitetassel.json.description: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

windblumeode.json.name: Windblume Ode
windblumeode.json.description: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.
windblumeode.json.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by {0} for 6s.

wineandsong.json.name: Wine and Song
wineandsong.json.description: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.
wineandsong.json.effect: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate Sprint by {0} for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by {1} for 5s.

wolfsgravestone.json.name: Wolf's Gravestone
wolfsgravestone.json.description: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.
wolfsgravestone.json.effect: Increases ATK by {0}. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by {1} for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

adventurer.json.name: Adventurer
adventurer.json.4pc: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

flower.name: Adventurer's Flower
flower.description: A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

plume.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
plume.description: The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.

sands.name: Adventurer's Pocket Watch
sands.description: It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.

goblet.name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet
goblet.description: The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.

circlet.name: Adventurer's Bandana
circlet.description: A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.

archaicpetra.json.name: Archaic Petra
archaicpetra.json.4pc: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

flower.name: Flower of Creviced Cliff
flower.description: A flower born of the minerals and rocks of cliffside cracks. The way its petals blow in the wind makes it seem alive.

plume.name: Feather of Jagged Peaks
plume.description: A hard feather from a large seacliff hawk. The basalt tip of the feather sometimes glistens with a cool dew.

sands.name: Sundial of Enduring Jade
sands.description: A sundial carved from a single, large piece of jade. Its lined with a pattern that silently records the passage of time.

goblet.name: Goblet of Chiseled Crag
goblet.description: A resplendent yet dignified wine goblet, once filled to the brim in an era long gone.

circlet.name: Mask of Solitude Basalt
circlet.description: A solemn mask exquisitely carved from basalt. Its hollow eyes stare ahead expressionless and cold.

berserker.json.name: Berserker
berserker.json.4pc: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

flower.name: Berserker's Rose
flower.description: An exquisite flower that has been dyed red. It represents the qualities of the Berserker.

plume.name: Berserker's Indigo Feather
plume.description: An indigo feather from a legendary raven, part of which has been dyed crimson red.

sands.name: Berserker's Timepiece
sands.description: An instrument with an eternal flow that continues mercilessly within, reminding the Berserker of the limited time he has left — both on the battlefield as well as in the world.

goblet.name: Berserker's Bone Goblet
goblet.description: A goblet made from the bone of an unknown beast. It was taken as a trophy after some deadly encounter.

circlet.name: Berserker's Battle Mask
circlet.description: A hideous iron mask that has been left half-shattered from vicious battles.

blizzardstrayer.json.name: Blizzard Strayer
blizzardstrayer.json.4pc: When a character attacks an opponent affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the opponent is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

flower.name: Snowswept Memory
flower.description: A long-extinct flower, covered in beads of frost, that once grew on the glaciers. There was a time when even the proudest and most arrogant warriors bowed before it.

plume.name: Icebreaker's Resolve
plume.description: A feather that exudes a chilly aura. One can almost feel the turbulent winds that brought it here, wailing over snow-covered plains and between frosty peaks.

sands.name: Frozen Homeland's Demise
sands.description: A timepiece from a nation of old that waited for their warriors' return. What flows inside is not sand, but bits of ice that never melt.

goblet.name: Frost-Weaved Dignity
goblet.description: A cup carved out of ice that is as chilly and biting as winter. Its former master would drink an unfreezable liquor from it.

circlet.name: Broken Rime's Echo
circlet.description: The crown of an ancient hero who dreamt of conquering the cold. It is proof of its former master's bravery in facing the bone-chilling cold of winter.

bloodstainedchivalry.json.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
bloodstainedchivalry.json.4pc: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

flower.name: Bloodstained Flower of Iron
flower.description: A dried flower stained black with blood and now as hard as steel. Probably some sort of a memento for its former master.

plume.name: Bloodstained Black Plume
plume.description: A raven feather pinned to a knight's cape. Countless bloodstains have dyed it pitch black.

sands.name: Bloodstained Final Hour
sands.description: A timepiece once used by a knight. The liquid inside has dried up, rendering it useless.

goblet.name: Bloodstained Chevalier's Goblet
goblet.description: The dark metallic vessel owned by the Bloodstained Knight. Its exterior has been stained as black as the night by smoke and coagulated blood.

circlet.name: Bloodstained Iron Mask
circlet.description: The iron mask the knight used to conceal their identity. Many have speculated about the face behind the mask.

braveheart.json.name: Brave Heart
braveheart.json.4pc: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

flower.name: Medal of the Brave
flower.description: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.

plume.name: Prospect of the Brave
plume.description: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.

sands.name: Fortitude of the Brave
sands.description: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.

goblet.name: Outset of the Brave
goblet.description: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

circlet.name: Crown of the Brave
circlet.description: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.

crimsonwitchofflames.json.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
crimsonwitchofflames.json.4pc: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

flower.name: Witch's Flower of Blaze
flower.description: A flower touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The anonymous flames affectionately caress the hands of those who touch it.

plume.name: Witch's Ever-Burning Plume
plume.description: A bird feather touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. Its eternal flame burns hot.

sands.name: Witch's End Time
sands.description: A timepiece worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The years the witch dedicated to the flames flow within.

goblet.name: Witch's Heart Flames
goblet.description: A flame-spitting urn left behind by the Crimson Witch of Flames, who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The fire in the urn burns eternally, as did its former master.

circlet.name: Witch's Scorching Hat
circlet.description: A hat once worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all of the demons in the world. The large brim blocked her sight.

defenderswill.json.name: Defender's Will
defenderswill.json.4pc: For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.

flower.name: Guardian's Flower
flower.description: An iris that was cherished by the guardian. Unfortunately, the chance never came for it to be given to whom the guardian loved.

plume.name: Guardian's Sigil
plume.description: A feather-shaped brooch that symbolizes someone’s yearning to defend others like a shield.

sands.name: Guardian's Clock
sands.description: A small timekeeping gadget. On moonless nights, it was the only way its former owner could know the time.

goblet.name: Guardian's Vessel
goblet.description: A metal vessel that can be filled with a drink to dispel the loneliness of the long watch.

circlet.name: Guardian's Band
circlet.description: A fabric band dyed indigo by the darkness of night. Can also double as a bandage in the event of an emergency.

gambler.json.name: Gambler
gambler.json.4pc: Defeating an opponent has a 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

flower.name: Gambler's Brooch
flower.description: A big, luxurious flower that can hide a loaded dice.

plume.name: Gambler's Feather Accessory
plume.description: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.

sands.name: Gambler's Pocket Watch
sands.description: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.

goblet.name: Gambler's Dice Cup
goblet.description: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.

circlet.name: Gambler's Earrings
circlet.description: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.

glacierandsnowfield.json.name: Glacier and Snowfield
glacierandsnowfield.json.4pc: Increases Superconduct DMG by 100%. Increases Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Burst increases Cryo DMG Bonus by 30% for 10s.

flower.name: Heart of Frost
flower.description: A flower that has been frozen in time from the moment it was picked. The knight kept it as a memento forever after.

plume.name: Plume of Snow
plume.description: A bird feather that was picked up by the knight who walked with the North Wind in the snow. It still awaits the day when it will thaw.

sands.name: Glacial Sand
sands.description: A timepiece once used by the knight who walked with the North Wind. A never-ending snowstorm rages within.

goblet.name: Goblet of Aquilo
goblet.description: A goblet of eonothem left behind by the knight who walked with the North Wind. The chill of the bitter winter frost still lingers within.

circlet.name: Crown of Glacier
circlet.description: The crown worn by the knight who walked with the North Wind. It was forged using winter ice and silver.

gladiatorsfinale.json.name: Gladiator's Finale
gladiatorsfinale.json.4pc: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

flower.name: Gladiator's Nostalgia
flower.description: No-one knows why the legendary gladiator wore this flower on his chest. It was the brutal warrior's only weakness.

plume.name: Gladiator's Destiny
plume.description: A feather of dreams that soars free like an eagle. At the end of the gladiator's legendary life, this parting gift was left upon his chest by a bird that knew true freedom.

sands.name: Gladiator's Longing
sands.description: A timepiece that recorded the gladiator's days in the bloodstained Colosseum. To him, it counted down the days on his long road to freedom.

goblet.name: Gladiator's Intoxication
goblet.description: The golden cup a champion gladiator drank from in ancient times. It brimmed with his glory for years until the fateful day of his fall.

circlet.name: Gladiator's Triumphus
circlet.description: The helmet of a legendary gladiator from ancient times, who would proudly stretch out his bloodied arms to welcome the thunderous applause of his audience.

heartofdepth.json.name: Heart of Depth
heartofdepth.json.4pc: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

flower.name: Gilded Corsage
flower.description: A mantle brooch that has lost its luster. The gold plating that once adorned it was ground away by the wind and the waves long ago.

plume.name: Gust of Nostalgia
plume.description: A feather carried over by whimpering sea winds and crimson waves. The passage of time has changed its shape and color.

sands.name: Copper Compass
sands.description: An ancient bronze compass. Its needle points towards some ever-distant shore, to a non-existent harbor.

goblet.name: Goblet of Thundering Deep
goblet.description: A faded wine cup that was unintentionally dredged up from the sea. Its dull exterior tells of the days it has spent beneath the waves.

circlet.name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
circlet.description: An ancient, wine-stained sea hat that still reeks of alcohol even now.

instructor.json.name: Instructor
instructor.json.4pc: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

flower.name: Instructor's Brooch
flower.description: Whenever the instructor wore this brooch, it meant there would be no training sessions that day.

plume.name: Instructor's Feather Accessory
plume.description: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.

sands.name: Instructor's Pocket Watch
sands.description: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.

goblet.name: Instructor's Tea Cup
goblet.description: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.

circlet.name: Instructor's Cap
circlet.description: A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.

lavawalker.json.name: Lavawalker
lavawalker.json.4pc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.

flower.name: Lavawalker's Resolution
flower.description: A flower that blooms amidst burning flames. It is said that long ago, a sage once wore it as he walked into a sea of fire.

plume.name: Lavawalker's Salvation
plume.description: The feather of a proud phoenix. You can almost hear the sound of its wings flapping in the scorching flames.

sands.name: Lavawalker's Torment
sands.description: Burning sand flows within this hourglass. Despite the intense heat, the sand leave no mark upon the vessel that houses it.

goblet.name: Lavawalker's Epiphany
goblet.description: A legendary goblet that can withstand extremely high temperatures. It still retains a degree of warmth even though it is now empty.

circlet.name: Lavawalker's Wisdom
circlet.description: The circlet of a sage who traversed a sea of fire. It once shone brightly from their ancient silhouette as they stood strong amidst the flames.

flower.name: Lucky Dog's Clover
flower.description: A four-leaf clover that grows in the wild. It was picked because it is said to bring good luck.

plume.name: Lucky Dog's Eagle Feather
plume.description: A monster once cornered an adventurer, but was then picked off by a hunting eagle... That eagle dropped this feather, which now carries some of the adventurer's good luck.

sands.name: Lucky Dog's Hourglass
sands.description: A broken hourglass from which all the sand has escaped. But it's fine, because the passage of time means nothing to someone without a single worry in the whole world.

goblet.name: Lucky Dog's Goblet
goblet.description: An exquisite metallic vessel that was once used to knock out a thief.

circlet.name: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
circlet.description: Its former owner once fell into a cave and found the treasure trove of an exiled royal. This is a souvenir from that incident.

maidenbeloved.json.name: Maiden Beloved
maidenbeloved.json.4pc: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

flower.name: Maiden's Distant Love
flower.description: A fragrant flower that will bloom for all eternity and never wither.

plume.name: Maiden's Heart-stricken Infatuation
plume.description: A feathered accessory that carries the longing for a certain someone, like a migratory bird on the wind.

sands.name: Maiden's Passing Youth
sands.description: The hands of time will never come to an end, but the same cannot not be said for those cherished years of the young maiden's life when she was doted upon.

goblet.name: Maiden's Fleeting Leisure
goblet.description: A vessel made with sweet black tea in mind rather than bitter liquor.

circlet.name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
circlet.description: A meticulously well-maintained woman's hat that keeps wrinkles safely out of sight.

martialartist.json.name: Martial Artist
martialartist.json.2pc: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
martialartist.json.4pc: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

flower.name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
flower.description: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

plume.name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
plume.description: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

sands.name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
sands.description: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.

goblet.name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
goblet.description: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

circlet.name: Martial Artist's Bandana
circlet.description: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.

noblesseoblige.json.name: Noblesse Oblige
noblesseoblige.json.4pc: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

flower.name: Royal Flora
flower.description: A satin flower with a glossy finish, fit for an elegant gathering. It still looks as distinguished as it did on the day it was cast aside.

plume.name: Royal Plume
plume.description: A feathered hat accessory worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt on hunts. It still stands proudly as if no time has passed.

sands.name: Royal Pocket Watch
sands.description: A pocket watch that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Passed down from generation to generation, it has witnessed many years of history.

goblet.name: Royal Silver Urn
goblet.description: An ornamental urn that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Mournful winds seem to echo within its empty interior.

circlet.name: Royal Masque
circlet.description: A masquerade mask worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Its hollow eyes are fixated on the golden days of the past.

paleflame.json.name: Pale Flame
paleflame.json.4pc: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, the 2-set effect is increased by 100%.

flower.name: Stainless Bloom
flower.description: A hard, blue artificial flower. Its petals shall never wither, nor shall its colors fade.

plume.name: Wise Doctor's Pinion
plume.description: An ominous pinion with edges of unsurpassed keenness. Perhaps it represents an unnaturally uninhibited nature.

sands.name: Moment of Cessation
sands.description: A pocket watch with a cover that cannot be opened. Yet it ticks and tocks away, following the inexorable flow of time.

goblet.name: Surpassing Cup
goblet.description: An intricately-made cup. Its appearance betrays nothing of its age to an observer.

circlet.name: Mocking Mask
circlet.description: A mask that covers the face, hiding one's expression from others.

prayersfordestiny.json.name: Prayers for Destiny
prayersfordestiny.json.1pc: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.

circlet.name: Tiara of Torrents
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it was submerged in water year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayersforillumination.json.name: Prayers for Illumination
prayersforillumination.json.1pc: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.

circlet.name: Tiara of Flame
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. After being subjected to the dancing sacrificial flames year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayersforwisdom.json.name: Prayers for Wisdom
prayersforwisdom.json.1pc: Affected by Electro for 40% less time.

circlet.name: Tiara of Thunder
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it harkened to the call of thunder year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayerstospringtime.json.name: Prayers to Springtime
prayerstospringtime.json.1pc: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.

circlet.name: Tiara of Frost
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it once weathered years of the icy cold, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayerstothefirmament.json.name: Prayers to the Firmament
prayerstothefirmament.json.1pc: Affected by Anemo for 40% less time.

circlet.name: Tiara of Gales
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Wind once freely flowed through the various openings in the headdress.

resolutionofsojourner.json.name: Resolution of Sojourner
resolutionofsojourner.json.4pc: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

flower.name: Heart of Comradeship
flower.description: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

plume.name: Feather of Homecoming
plume.description: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

sands.name: Sundial of the Sojourner
sands.description: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.

goblet.name: Goblet of the Sojourner
goblet.description: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

circlet.name: Crown of Parting
circlet.description: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.

retracingbolide.json.name: Retracing Bolide
retracingbolide.json.4pc: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

flower.name: Summer Night's Bloom
flower.description: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?

plume.name: Summer Night's Finale
plume.description: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.

sands.name: Summer Night's Moment
sands.description: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.

goblet.name: Summer Night's Waterballoon
goblet.description: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.

circlet.name: Summer Night's Mask
circlet.description: A popular mask cast in the image of a deity, as described in the legends.

scholar.json.name: Scholar
scholar.json.4pc: Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

flower.name: Scholar's Bookmark
flower.description: A dried flower used as a bookmark. It has absorbed the scent from the pages.

plume.name: Scholar's Quill Pen
plume.description: A bird's feather that serves as a quill pen. The tip has long been stained black.

sands.name: Scholar's Clock
sands.description: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.

goblet.name: Scholar's Ink Cup
goblet.description: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.

circlet.name: Scholar's Lens
circlet.description: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.

tenacityofthemillelith.json.name: Tenacity of the Millelith
tenacityofthemillelith.json.4pc: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the ATK of all nearby party members is increased by 20% and their Shield Strength is increased by 30% for 3s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

flower.name: Flower of Accolades
flower.description: A flower made from gold leaf. It represents the glories and honors attained by its wearer.

plume.name: Ceremonial War-Plume
plume.description: A falcon feather worn on ceremonial occasions. It displays the dignity and resolve of Liyue Harbor to the outside world.

sands.name: Orichalceous Time-Dial
sands.description: A simple device for telling time. This was once standard-issue for the Millelith during times of war.

goblet.name: Noble's Pledging Vessel
goblet.description: A golden cup used by the Millelith to take their oaths. Still bears the lovely scent of wine.

circlet.name: General's Ancient Helm
circlet.description: A splendorous helmet from ages past. Clean the dust away and it will look brand-new once more.

theexile.json.name: The Exile
theexile.json.4pc: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

flower.name: Exile's Flower
flower.description: A withered flower worn on the shirt. Its former owner insisted on wearing it even in exile, so it must mean something.

plume.name: Exile's Feather
plume.description: Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.

sands.name: Exile's Pocket Watch
sands.description: Even after the crystal watch face was shattered and the hands lost, its former owner kept it until the end.

goblet.name: Exile's Goblet
goblet.description: A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.

circlet.name: Exile's Circlet
circlet.description: A prestigious circlet. However, the royal insignia has been scratched out, and it is no longer the symbol of distinguished status that it once was.

thunderingfury.json.name: Thundering Fury
thunderingfury.json.4pc: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

flower.name: Thunderbird's Mercy
flower.description: A lightning-infused flower, somehow spared the fate of being trodden underfoot or reduced to ash by the furious purple fire, making it the sole survivor on the day of disaster.

plume.name: Survivor of Catastrophe
plume.description: A lightning-charged feather that still flickers with the wrath of the Thunderbird's cruel retribution.

sands.name: Hourglass of Thunder
sands.description: The hourglass used to foretell the coming of the Thunderbird by the tribe that worshiped it. It has fallen into eternal silence now that the tribe is no more.

goblet.name: Omen of Thunderstorm
goblet.description: A ceremonial cup that holds the blood of the innocent. It is brimming with the thundering fury of the prayers that echo within.

circlet.name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
circlet.description: A crown once worn by an ancient shaman who worshiped the Thunderbird. The capricious beast remained unmoved by the shaman's devotion.

thundersoother.json.name: Thundersoother
thundersoother.json.4pc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.

flower.name: Thundersoother's Heart
flower.description: A flower that blooms even amidst ferocious thunder and lightning. To this day, it still grants courage to travelers in thunderstorms.

plume.name: Thundersoother's Plume
plume.description: The feather of a predatory bird that soars through lightning storms. It was said to have been adopted as an insignia by the legendary hero who pacified thunder and lightning.

sands.name: Hour of Soothing Thunder
sands.description: A timepiece kept by the hero who conquered thunder and lightning. The tiny shards of Electro crystal within flow back and forth with the passing of time.

goblet.name: Thundersoother's Goblet
goblet.description: The wine goblet from which the Thundersoother, who defeated the Beast of Thunder, once drank violet lightning.

circlet.name: Thundersoother's Diadem
circlet.description: The crown given to the Thundersoother for defeating the Beast of Thunder that had been wreaking havoc upon the land.

tinymiracle.json.name: Tiny Miracle
tinymiracle.json.4pc: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

flower.name: Tiny Miracle's Flower
flower.description: A flower that grew from a rock, breaking through the stone as it strove to reach the light.

plume.name: Tiny Miracle's Feather
plume.description: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.

sands.name: Tiny Miracle's Hourglass
sands.description: Just an ordinary, everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.

goblet.name: Tiny Miracle's Goblet
goblet.description: A cup commonly used for fortune-telling. It can also hold water, of course.

circlet.name: Tiny Miracle's Earrings
circlet.description: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.

flower.name: Traveling Doctor's Silver Lotus
flower.description: A precious medicinal ingredient that has lost all medicinal value after years in storage.

plume.name: Traveling Doctor's Owl Feather
plume.description: The durable feather of an owl. Emblematic of nocturnal supremacy, it gave some encouragement to the Traveling Doctor when venturing out to visit patients late at night.

sands.name: Traveling Doctor's Pocket Watch
sands.description: A precise instrument used for keeping time. For a doctor, every second counts.

goblet.name: Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot
goblet.description: This pot used to carry concentrated and extremely potent concoctions. It is now empty, but still gives off a strong smell of medicine.

circlet.name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
circlet.description: Used to tie back the doctor's hair when treating patients. Can also be used as a sling for sprains and broken arms in emergencies.

viridescentvenerer.json.name: Viridescent Venerer
viridescentvenerer.json.4pc: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

flower.name: In Remembrance of Viridescent Fields
flower.description: A wild flower that was once a ubiquitous sight in its homeland. It was picked by a hunter who wore it on their chest.

plume.name: Viridescent Arrow Feather
plume.description: The fletching of an arrow that once pierced right through its prey, but somehow still remains spotless.

sands.name: Viridescent Venerer's Determination
sands.description: A wondrous instrument that a hunter once wore. It forever points towards their prey.

goblet.name: Viridescent Venerer's Vessel
goblet.description: A water pouch used by the Viridescent Venerer. Its capacity is much greater than one would expect.

circlet.name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
circlet.description: A proud crown that once belonged to the Viridescent Venerer. It is as lush and green as the breezes of the wild.

wandererstroupe.json.name: Wanderer's Troupe
wandererstroupe.json.4pc: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or a Bow.

flower.name: Troupe's Dawnlight
flower.description: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.

plume.name: Bard's Arrow Feather
plume.description: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.

sands.name: Concert's Final Hour
sands.description: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.

goblet.name: Wanderer's String-Kettle
goblet.description: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which play a wondrous tune as the water flows out.

circlet.name: Conductor's Top Hat
circlet.description: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.

c1.name: Flower of Eden
c1.effect: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's **Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma** regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

c2.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
c2.effect:
Transient Blossoms generated by **Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma** grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
·Unleashing **Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide** consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
·This effect stacks up to 4 times.

c3.name: Grace of Helios
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Descent of Divinity
c4.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

c5.name: Tide of Hadean
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dust of Purification
c6.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

c1.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
c1.effect: Fires 2 arrows per **Aimed Shot**. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

c2.name: Bunny Triggered
c2.effect:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

c3.name: It Burns!
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Fiery Rain** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
c4.effect: Decreases **Explosive Puppet**'s CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

c5.name: It's Baron Bunny!
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Explosive Puppet** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Wildfire
c6.effect: **Fiery Rain** increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

c1.name: Gleeful Songs
c1.effect: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

c2.name: Vitality Burst
c2.effect:
Decreases the CD of **Let the Show Begin♪** by 15%.
During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

c3.name: Star of Tomorrow
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Shining Miracle♪** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Attentiveness be My Power
c4.effect:
Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

c5.name: The Purest Companionship
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Let the Show Begin♪** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dedicating Everything to You
c6.effect:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
·Automatically revives the fallen character.
·Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

c1.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
c1.effect:
When **Stormbreaker** is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

c2.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
c2.effect: **Stormbreaker**'s arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

c3.name: Summoner of Storm
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Tidecaller** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Stunning Revenge
c4.effect: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional Electro DMG.

c5.name: Crimson Tidewalker
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Stormbreaker** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Bane of Evil
c6.effect: During the duration of **Stormbreaker**, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

c1.name: Grand Expectation
c1.effect: **Fantastic Voyage**'s ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

c2.name: Impasse Conqueror
c2.effect: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

c3.name: Unstoppable Fervor
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Passion Overload** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Unexpected Odyssey
c4.effect:
Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of **Passion Overload**'s Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

c5.name: True Explorer
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Fantastic Voyage** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Fire Ventures with Me

Increases the Level of **Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
c6.effect: Activating 2 of **Guhua Sword: Raincutter**'s sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.

c1.name: Fatal Acceleration
c1.effect:
Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.
Can only occur once every 5s.

c2.name: Impromptu Opening
c2.effect: **Riff Revolution**'s Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

c3.name: Double-Stop
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Sweeping Fervor** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Wildfire Rhythm
c4.effect: **Sweeping Fervor**'s swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

c5.name: Screamin' for an Encore
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Riff Revolution** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
c6.effect: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

c1.name: The Law Knows No Kindness
c1.effect: When Yanfei uses her Charged Attack, each existing Scarlet Seal additionally reduces the stamina cost of this Charged Attack by 10% and increases resistance against interruption during its release.

c2.name: Right of Final Interpretation
c2.effect: Increases Yanfei's Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 20% against enemies below 50% HP.

c3.name: Samadhi Fire-Forged
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Signed Edict** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Supreme Amnesty
c4.effect:
When **Done Deal** is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 45% of Yanfei's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Pyro DMG 250% more effectively.

c5.name: Abiding Affidavit
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Done Deal** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Extra Clause
c6.effect: Increases the maximum number of Scarlet Seals by 1.

c1.name: Rock, the Backbone of Earth
c1.effect: Increases the maximum number of Stone Steles created by **Dominus Lapidis** that may exist simultaneously to 2.

c2.name: Stone, the Cradle of Jade
c2.effect: **Planet Befall** grants nearby characters on the field a Jade Shield when it descends.

c3.name: Jade, Shimmering through Darkness
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Dominus Lapidis** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Topaz, Unbreakable and Fearless
c4.effect: Increases **Planet Befall**'s AoE by 20% and increases the duration of Planet Befall's Petrification effect by 2s.

c5.name: Lazuli, Herald of the Order
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Planet Befall** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Chrysos, Bounty of Dominator
c6.effect:
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, 40% of that incoming DMG is converted to HP for the current character.
A single instance of regeneration cannot exceed 8% of that character's Max HP.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Weiss
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
combat2.info:
Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance.

**Solar Isotoma**
has the following properties:
·When opponents within the Solar Isotoma field take DMG, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF. 
·Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s.
·When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time.
·Solar Isotoma is considered a Geo construct. Only one Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself can exist at a time. 

**Hold** to designate the location of the skill.
combat2.description: This Geo bloom has an unusual property mirrored in the aim of alchemy. To rise from the earth, soar into the sky, and become the sun.

combat3.name: Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide
combat3.info:
Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing AoE Geo DMG in front of him.
If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing AoE Geo DMG.

Tectonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.
combat3.description: Under the Kreideprinz's command, the tectonic tide of creation seethes into life.

passive1.name: Calcite Might
passive1.info: Transient Blossoms generated by **Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma** deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.

passive2.name: Homuncular Nature
passive2.info: Using **Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide** increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.

passive3.name: Flash of Genius
passive3.info: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Sharpshooter
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

**Charged Attack**
Perform a more precise **Aimed Shot** with increased DMG.
While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal Pyro DMG.

**Plunging Attack**
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Explosive Puppet
combat2.info:
The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage.

**Baron Bunny**
·Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire.
·Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP.
·When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

**Hold**
Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny.
The longer the button is held, the further the throw.
combat2.description: Baron Bunny hails from a storied lineage, but Amber has stopped keeping count since Baron Bunny the 893rd.

combat3.name: Fiery Rain
combat3.info: Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG.
combat3.description: Amber's passion truly burns hot.

passive1.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
passive1.info: Increases the CRIT Rate of **Fiery Rain** by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

passive2.name: Precise Shot
passive2.info: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

passive3.name: Gliding Champion
passive3.info:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Whisper of Water
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

**Charged Attack**
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.

**Plunging Attack**
Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

combat2.name: Let the Show Begin♪
combat2.info:
Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and applying the Wet status to them.

**Melody Loop**
·On hit, Barbara's Normal Attacks heal your own party members and nearby teammates for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP.
·On hit, Barbara's Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing.
·Periodically regenerates your own active character's HP.
·Applies the Wet status to the character and to opponents who come in contact with them.
combat2.description: Barbara's music is the magic that heals her companions.

combat3.name: Shining Miracle♪
combat3.info: Heals your own party members and nearby teammates for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.
combat3.description: Barbara's desire to heal strengthens her will to fight and sing.

passive1.name: Glorious Season
passive1.info: The Stamina Consumption of characters within **Let the Show Begin♪**'s Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

passive2.name: Encore
passive2.info:
When your active character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of the Melody Loop of **Let the Show Begin♪** is extended by 1s.
The maximum extension is 5s.

passive3.name: With My Whole Heart♪
passive3.info: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Oceanborne
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Tidecaller
combat2.info:
Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder.

**Press**
Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG.

**Hold**
Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP.
Attacks using the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. DMG dealt scales with the number of times Beidou is attacked in the skill's duration. The greatest DMG Bonus will be attained once this effect is triggered twice.
The shield possesses the following properties:
·Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency.
·Applies the Electro element to Beidou upon activation.
combat2.description: Conquer the high seas! Pursue the waves and chase the storm!

combat3.name: Stormbreaker
combat3.info:
Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan, Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents.

**Thunderbeast's Targe**
·When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between opponents, dealing Electro DMG.
·Increases the character's resistance to interruption, and decreases DMG taken.

A maximum of 1 lightning discharge can be triggered per second.
combat3.description: With a peal of thunder, Haishan is slain.

passive1.name: Retribution
passive1.info: Counterattacking with **Tidecaller** at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.

passive2.name: Lightning Storm
passive2.info:
Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing **Tidecaller** with its maximum DMG Bonus: 
·DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.
·Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.

passive3.name: Conqueror of Tides
passive3.info:
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Strike of Fortune
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Passion Overload
combat2.info:
Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is...

**Press**
A single, swift flame strike that deals Pyro DMG.

**Hold (Short)**
Charges up, resulting in different effects when unleashed based on the Charge Level.
·Level 1: Strikes twice, dealing Pyro DMG and launching opponents.
·Level 2: Unleashes 3 consecutive attacks that deal impressive Pyro DMG, but the last attack triggers an explosion that launches both Bennett and the enemy.
Bennett takes no damage from being launched.
combat2.description: An attack that combines Bennett's dreams and passion with Pyro. But passion is sometimes overblown, and Pyro sometimes blows over.

combat3.name: Fantastic Voyage
combat3.info:
Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals Pyro DMG, creating an Inspiration Field.

**Inspiration Field**
·If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. The amount of HP restored scales off Bennett's Max HP.
·If the health of a character within the AoE is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK.
·Imbues characters within the AoE with Pyro.
combat3.description: Benny's Adventure Team's adventures are always fraught with unexpected danger. However, Bennett is more inclined to call them "journeys full of wonder, excitement, and beauty."

passive1.name: Rekindle
passive1.info: Decreases **Passion Overload**'s CD by 20%.

passive2.name: Fearnaught
passive2.info:
Within the area created by **Fantastic Voyage**, **Passion Overload** takes on the following effects:
·CD is reduced by 50%.
·Bennett will not be launched by the effects of Charge Level 2.

passive3.name: It Should Be Safe...
passive3.info: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Demonbane
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. 

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost
combat2.info:
Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals Cryo DMG.
After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with Cryo.
combat2.description: "A crystal-clear ring, and all is silent. The rivers move not, and the clouds are heavy with frost. The altar gates open, and evil is banished."

combat3.name: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star
combat3.info:
Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.
When the spirit blades explode, they will deal AoE Cryo DMG and launch opponents.
combat3.description: "As ice doth give the biting frost birth, My transcendent blade shakes heaven and earth. Heed my summons and come hence!"

passive1.name: Steady Breathing
passive1.info: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by **Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost** have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 8%.

passive2.name: Rimechaser Blade
passive2.info: When the field created by **Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost** disappears, another spirit blade will be summoned to strike nearby opponents, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as AoE Cryo DMG. Opponents hit by this blade will have their Cryo RES decreased by 10% for 8s.

passive3.name: Gallant Journey
passive3.info: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Tempered Sword
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Searing Onslaught
combat2.info:
Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.

This skill can be consecutively used 3 times. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.
combat2.description: The slashes represent the values that Diluc holds dear: one for justice, one for courage, and one for duty.

combat3.name: Dawn
combat3.info:
Releases intense flames to knock back nearby opponents, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG.
The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with Pyro.
combat3.description: The only reason to walk in the darkness is to light it up. Behold, that fleeing light in the dead of night is the herald of the coming dawn.

passive1.name: Relentless
passive1.info: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

passive2.name: Blessing of Phoenix
passive2.info: The Pyro Infusion provided by **Dawn** lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.

passive3.name: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
passive3.info: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Kätzlein Style
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

**Charged Attack**
Perform a more precise **Aimed Shot** with increased DMG.
While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG.

**Plunging Attack**
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Icy Paws
combat2.info:
Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit.
The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target.

**Press**
Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws.

**Hold**
Dashes back quickly before firing five Icy Paws.
The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus.

The shield has a 250% Cryo DMG Absorption Bonus, and will cause your active character to become affected by Cryo at the point of formation for a short duration.
combat2.description: When she first started bartending, Diona found that no matter how much ice she put in her cocktails, it would never do a drunkard any harm. That all changed when she received her Vision — now she can form ice cold enough to cause severe brainfreeze. Five out of five stars!

combat3.name: Signature Mix
combat3.info:
Tosses out a special cold brew that deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE.

**Drunken Mist**
·Deals continuous Cryo DMG to opponents within the AoE.
·Continuously regenerates the HP of characters within the AoE.
combat3.description: A horrific mix that even Diona considers inhumane. The horrifying foretaste should be left for one's opponents. It has a crisp aftertaste, but unfortunately, one can only feel it on one's nose and skin.

passive1.name: Cat's Tail Secret Menu
passive1.info: Characters shielded by **Icy Paws** have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.

passive2.name: Drunkards' Farce
passive2.info: Opponents who enter the AoE of **Signature Mix** have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.

passive3.name: Complimentary Bar Food
passive3.info: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

combat1.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Edel
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Icetide Vortex
combat2.info:
Sharp frost, swift blade.

**Press**
Slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG.
When it hits an opponent, Eula gains a stack of Grimheart that stacks up to 2 times. These stacks can only be gained once every 0.3s.

**Grimheart**
Increases Eula's resistance to interruption and DEF.

**Hold**
Wielding her sword, Eula consumes all the stacks of Grimheart and lashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG to opponents in front of her.
If Grimheart stacks are consumed, surrounding opponents will have their Physical RES and Cryo RES decreased.
Each consumed stack of Grimheart will be converted into an Icewhirl Brand that deals Cryo DMG to nearby opponents.
combat2.description: "So the waves roiled, swallowing the crown of the nobles. And ever after did each drop amidst the icy waves reflect a golden crown, each and every droplet of the spray shining with its light."

combat3.name: Glacial Illumination
combat3.info:
Brandishes her greatsword, dealing Cryo DMG to nearby opponents and creating a Lightfall Sword that follows her around for a duration of up to 7s.
While present, the Lightfall Sword increases Eula's resistance to interruption. When Eula's own Normal Attack, Elemental Skill, and Elemental Burst deal DMG to opponents, they will charge the Lightfall Sword, which can gain an energy stack once every 0.1s.
Once its duration ends, the Lightfall Sword will descend and explode violently, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents.
This DMG scales on the number of energy stacks the Lightfall Sword has accumulated.
If Eula leaves the field, the Lightfall Sword will explode immediately.
combat3.description: It is easy to sink. But even so, she desires to freeze this oncoming tide.

passive1.name: Roiling Rime
